page.title: 01ST.ANDREWS CHURCH
page.content:
The Church is 110 years old and built by Mr Barneby.There is one service each Sunday at 11.15a.m.and ashort one every day at 8o'clock.Reverend Harper is the vicar and Miss Margaret Evans the organist.There are approximately 35 members in the congregation.They do not have a choir or bell-ringers.There are 29 steps up the tower.The old vicarage is now a private house,the new vicarage is 3years old.Some of the stained glass windows are 100years old.The church clock was put in, in memory of Mr. Barnaby.
SARAH
